statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={3.3} , \displaystyle{b}={4.3}, \displaystyle{c}={5.2}, and \displaystyle{d}={7.6}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={6.3}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
